医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
禽流感检测很难进行。那么我们如何知道何时拉响大流行警报呢？斯坦福大学传染病医生阿布拉·卡兰（Abraar Karan）最近接诊了很多流鼻涕、发烧、眼睛发炎的患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Bird-flu-tests-are-hard-to-get-So-how-will-we-know-when-to-sound-the-pandemic-警报.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Bird-flu-tests-are-hard-to-get-So-how-will-we-know-when-to-sound-the-pandemic- Alarm.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e808993-34f9-4fe5-a603-449d6f8d7a65 Tue, 11 Jun 2024 07:05:15 -0400 Bird flu tests are hard to get. So how will we know when to sound the pandemic alarm?
药剂师称，拜登计划为医疗保险患者节省药物费用，但可能会导致货架空空如也拜登政府旨在降低医疗保险患者药品成本的新政策实施几个月后，独立药剂师表示，他们正在努力维持一些处方药的库存。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Biden-plan-to-save-Medicare-患者-money-on-drugs-risks-empty-shelves-pharmacists-say.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Biden-plan-to-save-Medicare-患者-money-on-drugs-risks-empty-shelves-pharmacists-say.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b473225-9857-4c0a-a5bc-d93e00558564 Tue, 11 Jun 2024 06:25:56 -0400 Biden plan to save Medicare patients money on drugs risks empty shelves, pharmacists say
极端天气条件如何影响低收入和中等收入国家的孕产妇健康？由于极端天气事件，基础设施遭到破坏，获得健康和医疗服务的机会减少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/How-do-extreme-weather-conditions-impact-maternal-health-in-low-venue-and-middle-venue-countries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/How-do-extreme-weather-conditions-impact-maternal-health-in-low-venue-and-middle-venue-countries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf136249-55aa-486d-81f1-846be1a3f3f5 Tue, 11 Jun 2024 06:08:00 -0400 How do extreme weather conditions impact maternal health in low-income and middle-income countries?

新的 omega-3 疗法有望治疗新生儿脑损伤一种治疗新生儿缺氧缺血（HI）脑损伤的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/New-omega-3-therapy-shows-promise-in-treating-newborn-brain-injuries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/New-omega-3-therapy-shows-promise-in-treating-newborn-brain-injuries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d66e5ec-c8e9-4a9f-8d53-e1a716f1eff4 Tue, 11 Jun 2024 04:23:00 -0400 New omega-3 therapy shows promise in treating newborn brain injuries
研究显示，加州野火烟雾与超过 52,000 人过早死亡有关研究显示，2008 年至 2018 年，野火 PM2.5 暴露导致加州超过 52,000 人过早死亡，并产生了重大经济影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Wildfire-smoke-linked-to-over-52000-premature-deaths-in-California-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Wildfire-smoke-linked-to-over-52000-premature-deaths-in-California-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=173e8e7b-0f01-4169-a333-6464f2f64022 Tue, 11 Jun 2024 00:10:00 -0400 Wildfire smoke linked to over 52,000 premature deaths in California, study reveals
敦促暴露在阳光下的优秀游泳运动员提高皮肤癌意识昆士兰大学的研究表明，尽管风险增加，但只有一小部分优秀游泳运动员定期检查皮肤是否有癌症迹象。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240610/Skin-cancer-awareness-urged-for-sun-expose-elite-swimmers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240610/Skin-cancer-awareness-urged-for-sun-expose-elite-swimmers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=312649d7-91cc-429f-a937-f9469282a8fb Mon, 10 Jun 2024 23:57:09 -0400 Skin cancer awareness urged for sun-exposed elite swimmers
患者的观点凸显了对嗅觉和味觉障碍进行研究的迫切需要来自莫内尔化学感官中心、北美嗅觉与味觉协会 (STANA) 和托马斯杰斐逊大学的研究人员和患者倡导者在 COVID-19 大流行期间齐聚一堂，将患者的声音纳入努力，优先考虑致力于改善人们护理的研究领域伴有嗅觉和味觉障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240610/Patient-perspectives-highlight-urgent-need-for-research-on-smell-and-taste-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240610/Patient-perspectives-highlight-urgent-need-for-research-on-smell-and-taste-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73a90f36-bbc9-42e5-acaf-7fefc3316ac7 Mon, 10 Jun 2024 23:53:33 -0400 Patient perspectives highlight urgent need for research on smell and taste disorders
研究通过DNA甲基化分析解开哺乳动物长寿的秘密研究人员开发了基于 DNA 甲基化的模型，预测 348 种哺乳动物的最长寿命、妊娠和性成熟，揭示了长寿的关键表观遗传标记。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240610/Study-unlocks-the-secrets-of-mammalian-longevity-through-DNA-methylation-analysis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240610/Study-unlocks-the-secrets-of-mammalian-longevity-through-DNA-methylation-analysis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b8265ccb-d443-4e26-b070-8967fa57103a Mon, 10 Jun 2024 23:47:00 -0400 Study unlocks the secrets of mammalian longevity through DNA methylation analysis
